altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: べにいろヒーロー
紅色HERO

description.en:
All that matters to 15-year-old Nobara Sumiyoshi is volleyball–she's an awesome player with big-time ambitions. But sometimes it seems like a girl just can't get a break in the competitive world of high school volleyball.  
Nobara's family wants her to inherit the role of "young mistress," serving rich patrons at her family's old-fashioned Japanese restaurant. No thanks! When Nobara transfers to Crimson Field High School, known for its top-notch volleyball team, it turns out that her mother will stoop to dirty tricks to keep her off the court. With assistance from her feisty Aunt Momoko, who's got some connections at Crimson Field, Nobara decides to start playing offense.

altTitles.ja: 魔王の始め方 THE COMIC

altTitles.en: How to Build a Dungeon: Book of the Demon King

description.en: "I do not trust humans. They'll betray you without fail." Aur, the man who had obtained the ability and right to become the Maou at the end of his life of research. Summoning the succubus Lilu, he then sets out on creating his own domain, a gigantic labyrinthine dungeon.
description.it: "Non mi fido degli umani. Ti tradiranno senza fallo." Aur, l'uomo che aveva ottenuto la capacità e il diritto di diventare il Maou alla fine della sua vita di ricerca. Convocando il succube Lilu, iniziò quindi a creare il suo dominio, un gigantesco labirinto sotterraneo … Il misantropo Maou che affrontava il mondo, il sipario si alza su una fantasia harem oscura!
description.ja: 人生をかけた研究の末に“魔王"となるべき力を手に入れた男──オウル。サキュバスの美女リルを召喚した彼は、自らの牙城となる地下迷宮の建造に乗り出していくが…? 人間不信の魔王が世界征服に挑む!!
description.es-la: "Eu não confio em seres humanos. Eles vão te trair, sem falhar." Aur, o homem que tinha obtido a capacidade eo direito de se tornar o Rei Demônio no final de sua vida de pesquisa. Convocando a succubus Lir, ele então sai para criar o seu próprio domínio, uma dungeon labiríntica gigantesca… o misantropo Rei Demônio querendo dominar o mundo, a cortina sobe em um harém obscuro de fantasia!

altTitles.ja: アンダーニンジャ

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

title.en: Hyouketsu Reijou-sama wo Follow Shitara, Mechamecha Dekiai Sareteshimatta Ken

altTitles.en: The Case Where I Followed the Freezing Lady and She Doted on Me Like Crazy

altTitles.ja: 氷結令嬢さまをフォローしたら、メチャメチャ溺愛されてしまった件

description.en:
『The Overwhelming Adoration of the Sweethearted Lady!』 

Alicia Ozrind, known in noble circles as the Frost Duchess, is feared for her cold and unyielding demeanor, earning her the reputation of a villainess among the aristocracy. But beneath her icy exterior lies a girl who simply struggles to express her true feelings. There is, however, one person who has melted her frozen heart—a young servant named Gray, who works as a cleaner in her grand estate. 

"You’re the only one who truly understands me!" 

Completely smitten and vulnerable around Gray, Alicia showers him with unrestrained affection. Whether it’s during meals, in the bath, or even before bedtime, her overwhelming sweetness knows no bounds! But their relationship isn’t without its hurdles—Alicia is a noble lady, and Gray a mere commoner.

Will Gray manage to endure the relentless love of this endearing aristocrat? This is a sugary-sweet, heart-melting romantic comedy set in a fantasy world!

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

description.en:
"283 Production" is a place where idols with striking personalities hang out and gather, a tiny yet lively agency that makes them feel right at home. Dealing with phone calls, preparing documents, accounting expenses, and so on... With a job different from "producing", office staff are the ones who support idols who shine.

283 Production's office staff, Nanakusa Hazuki. Being a staff, a daughter, and an older sister, the experiences she gathered from her daily life and her feelings shall become the light to help the idols "shine". 

A new "Idolm@ster Shiny Colors" will begin to unfold──from the perspective of an office staff!
description.ja: 「283プロダクション」 個性豊かなアイドルたちが集まる、小さいながら賑やかな「家」のような事務所。 電話対応、書類作成、経費精算などなど…… 「プロデュース」とは別のお仕事で、輝くアイドルたちを支えているのが事務員さんです。 283プロの事務員・七草はづき。 事務員として、娘として、そして姉として 積み重なった日々と想いが、アイドルを“輝かせる”明かりとなる── 事務員視点で綴る、新たな「アイドルマスター シャイニーカラーズ」開幕です！

description.en: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

description.en:
One day energetic high school girl Hina Katagiri suddenly time travels to the year 1907 in Tokyo. 
The first person she sees is a sorrowful man named Takaaki Hongo. Who exactly is this Hongo-sama? 
As fate works its gears, how will their romance unfold? Transcending time, two people meet their destiny.  
  


---
description.es: De repente, un día, una enérgica chica de secundaria, Hina Katagiri, viaja en el tiempo hasta el año 1907. La primera persona que ve es el hombre afligido llamado Takaaki Hongo. ¿Quién es exactamente este Hongo-sama? Mientras el destino trabaja sus engranajes, ¿cómo se desarrollará su romance? Trascendiendo el tiempo, dos personas se encuentran. Un destino.

description.en: Left homeless, Kasumi decides to fix the situation on her own to not be an inconvenience to her busy family. But through a misunderstanding, she meets this handsome flower artist, who… despite being older, seems to be very interested in her. Has the time for her to fall in love finally come?
description.es: Al quedarse sin hogar, Kasumi decide solucionar la situación por su cuenta para no molestar a su ocupada familia. Pero por un malentendido, conoce a este apuesto artista de las flores, quien… a pesar de ser mayor, parece estar muy interesado en ella. Ambos sienten que son el amor de sus vidas pero… ¿Ahora Kasumi, así de fácil… vivirá con él?
description.ja:
宮沢かすみ、フツーの高校2年生。
ある日突然、遠方に住む家族の手違いで住む家をなくしてしまったかすみは、
ひょんなことからイケメン華道家・咲人に拾われ一緒に暮らすことに――！？

イケメン華道家とフツーのJKがひとつ屋根の下！？
愛されまくりのトキメキ年の差同居ラブ！

description.en: The rude guy Hibari met at the ramen place turns out to be Gaku, a band member attending her art school. As she gets pushed around by him, her “normal” world begins to change drastically. A clashing love story between an exceptional musician and an aspiring designer is set to start!
description.fr: Hibari Akanashi est une jeune étudiante en arts graphiques qui travaille très dur pour réaliser ses objectifs. Lorsqu'elle fait la rencontre de l'impétueux Gaku, un musicien vivant au gré de ses envies, de nouvelles émotions germent en elle...

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.

altTitles.en: Kissing You Before Going To Bed

description.ar: جي-هو اكتسبت قواها الذهنية على إثر حادثة وقعت في طفولتها! ولكن لا يمكنها التحكم بها! وبعد تحملها المعاناة جراء هذه القوة المزعجة لمدة 18 عامًا، اكتشفت جي-هو أنّ تلامسها الجسدي مع جارها يي-تشان يخفف من عذابها الذهني مؤقتًا. كي تتمكن جي-هو من ملامسته بشكل أخلاقي، فعليها إغواء يي-تشان في هذه الحكاية الملغمة باللحظات العفوية والفكاهية والرومانسية وفانتازيا البطولة الحركية بلمسة من الفوضى الناجمة عن القوى الخارقة.
description.en: Jiho gains psychic powers from a childhood accident! However, she can't control them! Enduring pain for 18 years with this troublesome ability, Jiho discovers that physical contact with the guy next door, Yechan, can temporarily free her from her psychic woes... To engage in legal physical contact, Jiho must seduce Yechan in this spontaneous and hilarious romantic fantasy hero action with a touch of superpower chaos!

Eden City, the second Las Vegas and a place where all pleasures of this world converge. Sarin comes to Eden City, trying to find the biological father of her niece, Hayan, using the diary of her twin sister, Irin, who died in a car accident. Along the way, Sarin encounters Owen, the king of Eden City.

Though frightened by Owen’s forceful attitude and the strange gaze that seems to desire her, Sarin chooses to stay by his side for the sake of her niece, Hayan. As she gets closer to Owen, she starts to uncover the darkness that looms over Eden City. Despite this, staying by Owen’s side becomes more natural for Sarin.

However, Sarin is also hiding a secret of her own…

When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..

title.en: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead

altTitles.en: The Hero Is Trying to Change the Heroine

Le héros essaie de changer la heroïne

altTitles.es: ¿El protagonista masculino está tratando de cambiar a la protagonista femenina?

altTitles.ja: 脇役のはずが、主人公に求婚されています

description.en:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
description.es: Quedé poseída por la extra 'Ruberia' cuyo nombre apenas se mencionaba. ¡Por qué, en la empobrecida novela <César se convierte en Emperador>, que está llena de guerras y accidentes, y donde la protagonista femenina se sacrifica por el protagonista masculino y todos mueren! Había planeado ocultar mis fuerzas y vivir en silencio y en silencio... El protagonista masculino, "César", sigue visitando a Ruberia e incluso le pide que se case con él, diciendo que quiere mantenerla a su lado.

title.en: The Great Mage of the Hero's Party Reincarnates

altTitles.en: The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage
Reincarnation of the Hero Party Archmage

altTitles.es-la: El renacimiento del archimago del grupo del héroe

altTitles.ja: 300年後に復活した大魔法使い

description.en:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil “Abyss” that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the “Abyss”. Leaving behind the words “I’ll be back”, Lynn’s soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.
description.es-la: El genio mago Lynn se embarca en un gran viaje a la edad de 13 años. Junto con el grupo de héroes, liderado por Esther, su objetivo es derrotar al gran malvado "Abismo" que pretende llevar al mundo al caos. Sin embargo, las batallas se vuelven cada vez más feroces y en el momento final, Lynn sucumbe al oscuro veneno del "Abismo". Dejando atrás las palabras "Volveré", el alma de Lynn permanece dormida durante 300 años, antes de resucitar en el cuerpo de un niño de noble cuna. Así comienza su segunda vida en un mundo pacífico. Pero mientras tanto, una fuerza oscura está acechando una vez más, amenazando con hundir al mundo en la confusión una vez más.

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!
description.pt-br: Um dos imperadores marciais conferidos, Gu Feiyang, faleceu nas montanhas Tiandang e reencarnou 15 anos depois como Li Yunxiao, do estado de Tianshui, embarcando em uma jornada que desafia o céu contra os inúmeros gênios da época. Os nove níveis da Arte Marcial; os Reinos Divinos dos dez quadrantes. A partir de então, o mundo inteiro caiu no caos!

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

altTitles.vi: Tôi Sẽ Giết Chết Nam Chính

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.en: A Saint Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saint Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saintess Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Una santa adoptada por el gran duque

altTitles.th: นักบุญหญิงผู้ถูกตระกูลแกรนด์ดยุกรับเลี้ยง

altTitles.ja: 大公家に転がり込んできた聖女様

description.en:
I was forced to live in captivity for the rest of my life because I happened to be aware of the fact that I was a saint. I was truly a 'real' saint, but that didn’t matter, because there was already a designated saint in the temple. When I died from all the abuse I endured, I was sent back to a time before all those previous events in my life had happened. After fifteen regressions, I was exhausted.

I prayed, "I don't want anything to do with this, so please just let me die."

And at the moment when I thought could finally be able to die, someone said, "How about being my daughter?"

…That monstrous grand duke adopted me.

---
"I want to quit. I don't want to live being exploited again."

Despite having the powers of a saint, she had to live her entire life in captivity—all for the sake of the fake saint who was anointed in secret. Unable to endure the torture any longer, she died alone and returned back in time. Daina, who chose a different path at the end of her forced repeated regressions, was adopted by the Grand Duke in a twist of fate…

"As the sole daughter of the Teresia family, I will make it so that you have everything."

Now that she has a new name and understands the importance of family, Daina decides to exact revenge so she can no longer be used by the temple.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EA%B0%80%EC%97%90-%EC%9E%85%EC%96%91%EB%90%9C-%EC%84%B1%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3524), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61913707)
description.es-la: Me vi obligada a vivir en cautiverio por el resto de mi vida porque me di cuenta del hecho de que era una santa. Yo era verdaderamente una santa 'real', pero eso no importaba, porque ya había una santa designada en el templo. Cuando morí por todo el abuso que soporté, fui enviada de regreso a un tiempo antes de que sucedieran todos esos eventos anteriores en mi vida. Después de 15 regresiones, estaba exhausta. Oré: "No quiero tener nada que ver con esto, así que por favor déjame morir". Y en ese momento en que finalmente pude morir, alguien dijo: "¿Qué tal ser mi hija?" …. Ese monstruoso duque me había adoptado.

altTitles.ja: ハブ・ア・バッドメモリー

description.en: I met the girl I always pass by at the hospital covered in blood. Scars will fade away someday, but there are some that she doesn't want to erase.

After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.

altTitles.ja: トモダチゲーム

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.tr: Katagiri Yuichi, arkadaşların paranın öneminden daha önemli olduğuna inanır, ancak yetersiz fonların zorluklarını da bilir. Lise gezisine gitmeyi taahhüt ettiği dört en iyi arkadaşıyla birlikte gitmeyi planlar ve bu yüzden para biriktirmek için çalışır. Ancak, sınıfın topladığı paranın hepsi çalınır! Şüphe, Yuichi'nin arkadaşları Sawaragi Shiho ve Shibe Makoto üzerine düşer.Kısa bir süre sonra, beşi kaçırılır ve garip bir odada, kısa ömürlü bir animenin karakteriyle uyanırlar. Görünüşe göre, onlardan biri büyük bir borcu ödemek için bir "arkadaşlık oyunu" na girmiştir. Ancak kimdi ve neden böyle bir borcu vardı? Sınıftan parayı çalıp oyunun giriş ücretini ödeyebilirler miydi? Katagiri ve en iyi arkadaşları, birbirlerine olan inançlarını test edecek veya yok edecek psikolojik oyunlarda başarılı olmak zorunda kalacaklar.
description.vi: Katagiri Yuichi tin rằng bạn bè quan trọng hơn tiền bạc, nhưng cậu cũng hiểu rõ sự khó khăn khi túng thiếu. Cậu làm việc chăm chỉ để tiết kiệm tiền cho chuyến đi dã ngoại thời trung học, vì cậu đã hứa với bốn người bạn thân của mình rằng tất cả sẽ cùng đi. Tuy nhiên, sau khi gom đủ tiền, toàn bộ quỹ lớp bị trộm mất! Sự nghi ngờ đổ lên đầu hai người bạn của Yuichi, Sawaragi Shiho và Shibe Makoto. Ngay sau đó, cả 5 người bị bắt cóc, và thấy mình tỉnh dậy trong 1 căn phòng kỳ lạ, cùng 1 nhân vật hoạt hình. Có vẻ như, một trong số 5 người đã đẩy bọn họ vào "trò chơi tình bạn" nhằm mong gỡ lại món tiền nào đó. Nhưng đó là ai, và tại sao bọn họ lại phải mang nợ? Phải chăng đã có kẻ trộm tiền của lớp để trả tiền được vào trò chơi này? Katagiri và những người bạn thân của mình buộc phải thắng trong trò chơi. Sẽ là bài kiểm tra tình bạn, hay phá hủy niềm tin giữa bọn họ?  Tên tiếng việt: Friends game - Trò chơi tình bạn
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

description.en: Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en: In the five years of the last days, the earth became purgatory. The poisonous sister in her body was killed by Warcraft, but Chen Yan had no counterattack. But when he woke up again, he found that he was reborn before the end, and he had an ability! The system came and told him how to save his sister. But the premise is that he must upgrade crazy to stop the end.

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

诺亚笔记

description.en: Professor Noah Minami Umberbach is not your average archeologist! For one, he's prone to whipping out his gun and blowing up stuff to make dramatic entrances. But that's just his eccentric nature. He's actually a man on a mission. A mission that may very well be the most important mission of all time. And he's dragging history-hating student Kotobuki Mirai along for the ride!

description.en: The boy Elt, who reincarnated as an aristocrat, was branded as incompetent and was thrown out as a manager of a remote area with zero territories. However, his "plant magic" was the best all-purpose magic for territorial development! As he cultivated by utilizing the magic that produces from crops to buildings and the knowledge of the previous life , the number of territories increased and became lively. Moreover, the territory that should have nothing is actually a treasure trove.
description.ja: 貴族に転生した少年エルトは戦闘に向かない植物魔法の才能により冷遇され、僻地の管理者として放りだされてしまう。だが彼の能力は、土地開拓には最適の万能魔法だった！

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/ramparts_ice)

Ye Wutian, a brilliant doctor from 2089, somehow time-travels back to the year 2019 in a lab experiment explosion. He wakes up in a wild mountain, and then manages to save a girl, Li Wan'er who's been bitten by a venomous snake. With his apparently superior knowledge in medicine, Ye Wutian embarks on an amazing journey in the beginning of the 21st century…

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.ja:
悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

description.ar:
هنا ، داخل رواية فنون الدفاع عن النفس هذه ، يوجد معلم حقيقي يعلم البطل المتعجرف وينقذه من الموت.
 وسيم وطيب وصالح وقوي و ...
 على أي حال ، كان هناك عيب كبير في معلم البطل وهو ابنته الوحيدة الحمقاء المليئة بالجشع... كانت شريرة اضافية ، كانت تطارد البطل دوما ولكنه لم يستطع التخلي عنها لانها ابنه معلمه.
 خلال قراءة الرواية ، قمت بلعن تلك الابنة وقلت أنه لو كنت أنا ، فلن أعيش هكذا.
 "لكن هذا لا يعني أنني أريد أن أكون هي!"
 ما هو أسوأ ان أبي مات بالفعل ، وسمعتي هي الأسوأ.
 هربت حتما ، لكن ... مت، لكن عندما فتحت عيني كان أبي حياً؟!
 "إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، في هذه الحياة ، سانقذ أبي بالتأكيد!"
 لكن…
 "أعتقد أنهم يستهدفون حفيدتي !؟ سأقتلهم جميعًا! "
 لماذا أرى جدي ، الذي لم يظهر سوى مرات قليلة في الرواية يتصرف هكذا؟
 "زواج؟ لا ، قالت يوني إنها ستعيش بجانبي لبقية حياتها ".
 حتى أبي ، بطريقة ما أصبح غريبًا.
 علاوة على ذلك،
 "لماذا تستمر في تفاديني؟ هل هذا خطأي أيضًا؟ "
 أليست الشخصية الرئيسية فجأة مهووسة بي؟
 في الأصل ، كان مقدرا لي أن أموت حتى أتيت إلى هنا ".
 لقد أنقذت ذلك الوغد ، لكن اليس العمل الصالح دوما يمر دون عقاب؟
 "على الأقل عندما أكون أمامك ... لا أعتقد أنني شخص رائع."
 الشرير الذي قطع عنقي يحاول فجأة التوبة.
 هل من المقبول حقًا أن يصبح الأمر هكذا؟

description.en:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/56272329)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%84%B8%EA%B0%80-%EC%B2%9C%EB%8C%80%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EC%86%90%EB%85%80-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3263), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61001975)

description.es:
¡La protagonista transmigró a un mundo de una novela de artes marciales! La protagonista transmigra al cuerpo de Baeklee Yeon, la tonta y detestable hija de Baeklee Ee-Gang, un ser perfecto y el maestro del protagonista masculino, quien lo guía hacia el camino de un héroe. Ella fue asesinada inesperadamente, pero cuando abrió los ojos descubrió que había regresado a su infancia donde podría enmendar todos sus errores. “¿Podré ser amada esta vez?” En esta vida, con la determinación de convertirse en la hija perfecta, en lugar de un fastidio, ella pasa de ser la nieta despreciada a la nieta amada de la familia Baeklee. “¡¿Crees que lo vales?!” “¡Sí!” Incapaz de ocultar su confusión ante el vigor de su ambiciosa nieta… “Si hay incluso una pequeña esperanza, ¿Cómo puedo, como padre, rendirme?” “…Es como hablarle a la pared.” Su abuelo secretamente abre su corazón después de ser arrollado por el dúo de atractivos padre e hija, resueltos a salvar a la incapacitada hija que no puede practicar artes marciales, aunque eso significara recibir su odio. ¡Y justo cuando su vida merecía ser vivida, ¿la obsesión de los candidatos a protagonistas masculinos hacia ella, empezó de repente?! ¡Yeon, sólo caminemos por el sendero de flores de ahora en adelante!

---
Aquí, dentro de esta novela de artes marciales, hay un verdadero maestro que enseña al arrogante protagonista masculino y lo despierta a través de la muerte. Guapo, bondadoso, recto, fuerte y... De todos modos, había un gran defecto en el excelente profesor del protagonista masculino. Era su tonta única hija la que estaba llena de codicia. Una villana extra tenaz, que siempre regresa para perseguir al protagonista masculino en todos los sentidos, pero no puede ser abandonada porque es la hija de su maestro. Mientras leía la novela, maldije a esa hija. Diciendo que si fuera yo, no viviría así. '¡Pero eso no significaba que yo quisiera ser ella!' Lo que era peor, Padre ya murió, y mi reputación es la peor. Inevitablemente, me escapé, pero... morí. Sin embargo, cuando abrí los ojos, ¿¡Padre estaba vivo!? '¡Si es así, en esta vida, definitivamente salvaré a Padre!' Sin embargo… “¿¡Pensar que están apuntando a mi nieta!? ¡Los mataré a todos!” ¿Por qué veo al abuelo, que ni siquiera aparece muchas veces a lo largo de la novela, tan a menudo así? "¿Casamiento? No. Yeonie dijo que viviría a mi lado por el resto de su vida”. Incluso Padre, de alguna manera se volvió raro. Además, “¿Por qué sigues evitándome? ¿Es este también mi error? ¿No se está obsesionando el personaje principal de repente conmigo? “Originalmente, estaba destinado a morir. Hasta que llegaste aquí. Salvé al bastardo de tiempo limitado, pero ¿no es que ninguna buena acción queda sin castigo? "Al menos cuando estoy frente a ti... no creo que sea una basura". El villano que me voló el cuello de repente está tratando de arrepentirse. ¿Está realmente bien si es así?

description.fr:
Dans ce roman d'arts martiaux, il y a un professeur qui enseigne à l’arrogant protagoniste et le sauve de la mort. Une belle apparence, intelligent, fort… Quoi qu'il en soit, ce professeur avait un point faible. Il s'agit de sa fille unique, stupide et remplie de cupidité. Une antagoniste tenace, qui ne fait qu’embêter le rôle principal masculin de toutes sortes de manières, mais ne peut être abandonnée car elle est la fille de son professeur. Tout au long de la lecture du roman, j'ai maudit cette fille. Dire que si c'était moi, je ne vivrais pas comme ça.

«Mais ça ne voulait pas dire que je voulais être elle!»

Et le pire arriva, la mort de mon père. Évidemment, je me suis enfuie, mais… J'ai été assassinée. Puis, quand j'ai ouvert les yeux, Père était en vie?!

«Cette fois-ci, dans cette vie, je sauverai père!»

Cependant…

«Comment osent-ils s'en prendre à ma petite-fille?! Je vais tous les tuer!»

Pourquoi est-ce que je croise grand-père, qui n'apparaît pas souvent dans le roman, aussi fréquemment?

«Un mariage? Non. Yeonie a dit qu'elle vivrait à mes côtés pour le restant de sa vie.»

Même Père, d'une manière ou d'une autre, est devenu bizarre.

De plus, «Pourquoi continuez-vous à m'éviter? Ai-je fait une erreur?»

Le personnage principal n'est-il pas soudainement en train de devenir obsédé par moi?

«À l'origine, j'étais destiné à mourir. Jusqu'à ce que tu viennes ici.»

J'ai sauvé ce bâtard limité dans le temps, mais n'est-ce pas qu'aucune bonne action ne reste impunie?

«Au moins quand je suis devant toi… je ne me sens pas comme une ordure.»

Le méchant qui m'a tuée essaie soudainement de se repentir.

Est-ce une bonne chose?

---

description.ru:
Здесь, внутри этого романа о боевых искусствах, есть учитель, который учит надменного мужского героя и пробуждает его силу. Красивый, добродушный, праведный, сильный и… К сожалению, у чертовски прекрасного учителя главного героя был один большой недостаток. Это была его глупая дочь, вдоволь наполненная жадностью. Стойкая статистка-злодейка, которая всегда возвращается, чтобы преследовать главного героя, но ее нельзя бросить, потому что она дочь учителя. На протяжении всего романа я проклинала эту дочь. Сказать честно, что если бы этой дочерью была я, то не допустила бы подобного. 

—Но это не значит, что я хотела быть ею!

Что еще хуже, отец уже умер, а моя репутация была ужасной. 

Я сбежала, но… я умерла. Однако, когда я открыл глаза, отец все ещё был жив!?

«Если так, то в этой жизни я обязательно спасу отца!»

Однако…

—Подумать только, они целятся в мою внучку!? Я убью их всех!

Почему я так часто вижу дедушку, который появлялся в романе от силы пару раз? 

—Брак? Нет. Ёни сказала, что будет жить рядом со мной до конца своей жизни. 

Даже отец стал вести себя как-то странно.

Более того:
—Почему ты продолжаешь меня избегать? Это тоже моя ошибка?

Почему главной герой внезапно стал так одержим мной? 

—До твоего прихода мне было суждено умереть

Я спасла временного ублюдка, но ведь ни одно доброе дело не остается безнаказанным?

—По крайней мере, когда я стою перед тобой…

Злодей, снесший мне шею, вдруг пытается раскаяться.

Все будет хорошо, так ведь?

---

description.tr:
Ana karakter; dövüş sanatları dünyasında başrolü, hikâyenin kahramanı yapacak olan güçlü ve eğitimini tamamlamış usta Baek Lee Ee-Gang’ın aptal ve sinir bozucu kızı Baek Lee Yeon olarak hayat bulur. Yeon, beklenmedik şekilde öldürülür ve gözlerini açtığında her şeyi geri alabileceği çocukluk günlerine geri döner. “Bu hayatımda ailem beni sevecek mi?” Baş belası olmak yerine harika bir evlat olmaya karar veren Yeon, Baek Lee ailesinin saygın torunu olarak hayatına başlar. Bu hayatını güzelce yaşamak ister ancak ailenin başı olan büyükbabası Baek Lee Pan-Hyuk da dahil olmak üzere herkes Yeon’a engel olur. Büyükbabasının bakışları o kadar serttir ki dağları ve nehirleri bile titretebilir. “O kadar değerli olduğunu mu sanıyorsun?”
“Evet.”
Büyükbaba, kendine güvenen torunu karşısında şaşkına döner ve oğluyla torununu gizlice izlemeye başlar.
“Çok az umut olsa da baba olarak nasıl hemen pes edebilirsin?”
“Amma inatçısın he.”
Yakışıklı oğlu, dövüş sanatları dünyasının yüz karası kızını o karanlıktan kurtarmaya ve herkesi karşısına almaya hazırdır. Yeon, tam hayatının artık daha güzel olacağını düşünürken erkek başroller bir bir ona takıntılı olmaya başlar!
“Yeonie’m, bu sefer hayatımız gerçekten çok güzel olacak!!”

description.vi:
Cô xuyên không trở thành một nhân vật chính trong thế giới võ lâm. Cô trở thành BaekRi Yeon, đứa con gái ngốc nghếch và quậy phá của BaekRi Eui Kang, một người thầy chân chính và là người đã dẫn dắt nhân vật nam chính trở thành một anh hùng. Sau khi bất ngờ bị giết, cô mở mắt ra và trở thành một đứa trẻ có thể làm đảo ngược mọi thứ. ‘Mình, lần này có thể nhận được sự yêu thương không?” Ở kiếp này, cô có niềm tin rằng mình sẽ trở thành con gái được yêu thương chứ không phải đứa con gái chịu nhiều tổn thương nữa, cô bắt đầu cuộc sống được mọi người kính trọng từ cháu gái của gia đình Baekri. Những gia tộc cản trở xuất hiện trước mặt Yeon, người chỉ muốn đi trên con đường rải đẩy hoa, và Baek Ri Pae-hyeok, là tộc trưởng và cũng là ông nội của cô, ông sở hữu khí phách của một vị vua, người có thể khiến cả núi sông và cây cối rung chuyển chỉ bằng một ánh mắt. “Ngươi cho rằng ngươi đáng giá như thế sao!” “Vâng!” Ông không thể che giấu sự hốt hoảng trước khí thế mạnh mẽ của cháu gái “Nếu còn một tia hy vọng mong manh, người làm cha sao con có thể từ bỏ?” “…Như là một đứa trẻ cứng đầu.” Ông lão bắt đầu mềm lòng vì hai cha con tuyệt mỹ đánh bại với quyết tâm sẽ cứu đứa cháu gái không có tài nghệ võ công … Tôi nghĩ rằng được sống ở thời điểm này là xứng đáng, nhưng nỗi ám ảnh của các ứng cử viên nam chính đột nhiên bắt đầu? Yeoni của chúng ta, bây giờ hãy chỉ đi trên con đường hoa thôi nhé!

description.pt-br:
Aqui, dentro desta novel de artes marciais, há um professor que ensina o protagonista arrogante e o desperta através de sua morte. Bonito, agradável, justo, forte e… enfim, só havia uma grande falha no professor do protagonista, que era sua filha única insensata, a qual era cheia de ambição. Uma persistente vilã extra que sempre assombra o protagonista de todas as formas, mas nunca pode ser abandonada por ser a filha do professor. Enquanto eu lia o romance, amaldiçoei-a, dizendo que, se eu fosse ela, não viveria daquela forma. Mas isso não significava que eu queria ser ela! Pior ainda, o pai já havia morrido e minha reputação era a pior. Inevitavelmente, eu fugi, mas… morri. No entanto, quando abri meus olhos, meu pai estava vivo?! “Já que é assim, nesta vida, vou definitivamente salvar meu pai! Entretanto… “Eles estão visando minha neta?! Vou matar todos eles” Por que vejo o meu avô, que sequer aparece muitas vezes na novel, com tanta frequência assim? “Casamento? Não. Yeon disse que viveria ao meu lado pelo resto da vida dela.” Mesmo meu pai se tornou estranho. Além disso, “Por que você continua me evitando? Cometi algum erro?”, o protagonista por um acaso está se tornando obcecado por mim? “Originalmente, eu estava destinado à morte. Até você chegar aqui.” Eu salvei o idiota que tinha os dias contados, mas não dizem que somos recompensados por nossas boas ações? “Pelo menos, quando estou à sua frente… não penso que sou um lix@.” De repente, o vilão responsável por minha morte está parecendo arrependido. Está mesmo tudo bem que as coisas sejam assim?

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

[Top Student Meets Popular Queen Bee] What secrets are these quiet girls hiding?
Zheng Shan found the lost class fee money in her locker. This was seen by Mary and several other classmates. In a panic, Zheng Shan hid the money. This caused a misunderstanding that she was the one who stole the class fee money. However, the class monitor, Mary, did not accuse Zheng Shan of theft. Instead, she reached out to her. Will it be a helping hand or a hand to pull Zheng Shan into the abyss?

But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport, until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

description.en: The main character in “Highly Spiced Marriage: Love Reality Show with 13 Greats” is Nao Anegawa, the eldest daughter of a mother-son family who loves her younger siblings who are in the prime of life. On her way home from shopping, she is whisked away to the heavenly realm and forced to appear on “Love Key Man,” a romantic reality show for the gods who have nothing better to do in their spare time. For every one of her male partners, 13 men are gathered from various eras, including Hijikata Toshizo, Friedrich II, Prince Shotoku, Alfred Nobel, and Urahara no Narihira. The ultimate love game with these great men who have left their mark on history begins.

description.en:
Seemingly gloomy and low-profile, but in reality, a proud domineering vampire queen —vs— a school heartthrob who appears poor but is actually a cunning "green tea" loyal dog.

The hunter becomes the hunted.

A "poor" university student plays the fool, hiding his true strength, all to make the vampire completely devoted to him?

When Shi An witnesses Jing Ying transform from a tiny bat into a human and straddle him, he finally realizes that vampires aren’t just myths. Jing Ying demands that he become his personal blood pet.
